description:
Mrs. Stadtfeld is the second wife of Mr. Stadtfeld, Kallen`s and Naoto K≈çzuki`s father.
[spoiler="History"]Since she could not bear any children of her own, Mrs. Stadtfeld accepted her husband`s proposal to adopt his daughter Kallen as his heir. Though Mrs. Stadtfeld ordered Kallen`s biological mother never to see her daughter again, Kallen`s mother refused and managed to persuade the Stadtfelds to hire her as a maid in their house so she could remain close to Kallen. However, Mrs. Stadtfeld is openly abusive towards Kallen`s mother, often hitting Kallen`s mother whenever any of the servants in the household make a mistake.[/spoiler]
(source: fandom.com)
name: Mrs. Stadtfeld
